tldr: Affected versions of this package may expose SSH keys in log files when multiple keys are included in the URL (e.g., `ssh://git@github.com/hashicorp/go-getter-test-private.git?sshkey=secretkey&sshkey=secretkey`). This flaw can lead to sensitive credential leakage.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a vulnerable version of the package.
vulnerable_to: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
